column4: does anyone know of a cross-platform protocol that'll send webcam during an IM session? I want to view on a linux box my friend's webcam, he runs windows. (And usually chats through yahoo, although i'm sure he'd consider switching). Anyone know a service that could help?
If there's a more relevant chat room, then I apologise, and could someone please poiint meat it?
didn't know pidgen could do that, but i'm not sure what you mean about listen and erUSUL, never heard of those
